name: Spiced Cranberry Muffins
description: Spiced cranberry muffins. Delicious sweet and sour fruity muffins that make a great snack or breakfast on the go.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups fresh cranberries mixed with 2 teaspoons of flour and 1 teaspoon sugar

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, mix in the flours, salt and baking soda.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, mix in the flours, salt and baking soda.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the rest of the ingredients except cranberries.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the rest of the ingredients except cranberries.

recipeInstructions.text: Gently mix everything till almost combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Gently mix everything till almost combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the flour coated cranberries and gently fold them in
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the flour coated cranberries and gently fold them in

recipeInstructions.text: Grease the mini muffin panand drop spoonfuls onto the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease the mini muffin panand drop spoonfuls onto the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated ovenat 350 degrees F for about 15 minutes!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated ovenat 350 degrees F for about 15 minutes!

keywords: quick muffin recipe, spiced muffins, vegan muffins
